item.description: As many of you have heard, I recently bought a townhouse, so stop by, see the new place and play a game or two or just visit if you like. This is a potluck, so please bring something to share. I will be emailing the directions and parking instructions to those that I have met and have RSVP'd YES on July 31th.

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: Open House/Game Day
